channel.title: Servers
channel.description:
im just getting back into moparscape and im looking for good servers, i already got zdiddy
even bad servers with nice people, this is not for you to advertise yur server.

item.title: Servers
item.dc:creator: @lil_scrub lil scrub
item.description:
@lil_scrub wrote:

[quote author=eczema3 link=topic=229572.msg1968645#msg1968645 date=1199204175]
he shoulda pmed, cause it is acctually advertising, you jsut havent read the rules properly.

5. No advertisements You may not post any link to your own site in this section. This section is strictly for asking all questions regarding RSPS (RuneScape Private Servers) and Development (Teams). Any other topics and polls that do not have direct relevance with the above description will be removed. Posting links in this section to a development team's website will most of the time result into mutes or moderations. Moderators may NOT and do not give random people permission to break this rule.

chill out

Read full topic
